title: Natur Research Ingredients
cleaned_text: Sponsored By Natur Research IngredientsNatur Research Ingredients November 26, 2007 1 Min Read LOS ANGELESNatur Research Ingredients obtained a license from the Wisconsin Alumni Research Foundation (WARF) to manufacture and distribute Cweet Natural Intense Sweetener, which is derived from brazzein, found in a West African fruit. Cweet Natural Intense Sweetener tastes like cane sugar and is 1,000 times sweeter than sugar on a weight-basis. Cweet is a zero-calorie sweetener with no after-taste, safe for diabetics and is heat-stable. Subscribe and receive the latest insights on the healthy food and beverage industry.
